title: Did the American Republic commend Okasio Cortez and Elhan Omar for the destruction of Notre Dame?
subtitle: The newly elected members of the United States House of Representatives are frequent targets of partisan deception.
author: David Emery
vclaim: The American Congresswomen of Alexandria Ocacio-Cortiz and Elhan Omar commended the destruction of the Notre Dame Cathedral in a fire that broke out in April 2019.
